alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 07 at 6:10AM PST until March 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Lower Columbia, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With temperatures near freezing, untreated roads may also be frosty and slick.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Pedestrians and bicyclists should consider wearing bright or reflective clothing to increase the chance of being seen.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; South Willamette Valley
